workflow.meta: 终止(撤回)相关文件审批流程工作流

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg: '请按照公司涉军项目管理要求，履行线下审批程序!'

result.display-name: 投资/质控/资本市场部人员发起

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s1=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DUAL WHERE ? IN (SELECT ID FROM JGCRM.LBORGANIZATION START WITH ID IN (13831,10015,10023) CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID)",[O_WORKFLOW.SQBM])
s1==1

step.name: 投资银行总部文管审批

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.LBSURROGATE WHERE SURROGATE IN (SELECT USERID FROM JGCRM.LBMEMBER WHERE ORGID = 10089 AND ROLEID = 3) AND CONSTITUENT IN (SELECT USERID FROM JGCRM.LBMEMBER WHERE ORGID = 10015 AND ROLEID = 3)")>0

step.name: 投资银行总部职能审批
投资银行总部总经理审批
质控部文管提交公司协同平台

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var a=ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.gdzqWorkflowWebservice.workflowSamples.InternalDocumentsJavabean");
var oaid=a.creatWorkFlow("lcIB_QY_ZZXGWJSPLC",O_WORKFLOW.ID,-1,$Login.User,'100000');
var ret = LB_sqlProcedure("{call ecif.pro_ib_oaresulthandle(:ral{int},:ret,?,?,?,?)}",[oaid,O_WORKFLOW.ID,"lcIB_QY_ZZXGWJSPLC",$Login.User]); 
ABS_SETRETNOTE(ret.get('ret'));
if(ret.get('ral')>0){
  true;
}else{
  false;
}

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var status=ABS_SQLVALUE("select max(status) from ECIF.tib_oawfhandle where upper(lcbd)=upper('lcIB_QY_ZZXGWJSPLC') and lcbdid=?",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
status==1
